name: qrway-backend
description: This directory contains two express servers: * AppServer.js - Combined Node/Express web server w/ Mongo Access * Server.js - Encapsulated Node/Express web server w/ Mongo Access

scripts.build-frontend: rm -rf ./dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../backend/dist && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.build-frontend-dev: rm -rf ./dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build-dev && cp -r ./dist ../backend/dist && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.start-dev: npm run clean && npm run build-frontend-dev && tsc && node AppServer.js
scripts.populate_db: npm run populate_items && npm run populate_menus && npm run populate_restaurants && npm run populate_users
